seo.title: National Rail - Welcome to the Official source for UK trains
seo.description: You've found the gateway into Britain's national train and rail network. The portal to rail travel, including train company information, promotions; train times; fares enquiries; ticket purchase and train running information.

image.altText: 2 senior Black men and 2 senior Black women standing laughing on a station platform with a train on the tracks next to them.

content.value: All the latest from National Rail.

items.name: Holidays and Events topic card
items.title: Holidays and events
items.bodyText: Check before you travel and see which upcoming events will have an impact on train services

image.name: Holidays and Events hero image
image.altText: Bunches of rainbow balloons at Brighton's Pride parade

items.name: Accessibility Topic Card
items.title: Accessibility
items.bodyText: We want everyone to be able to access our services – here’s what we do to support customers

image.name: Accessible Train Travel and Facilities hero image
image.altText: A woman in a wheelchair with camping equipment on the back wheels herself down a train platform with a train standing next to it.

items.name: Industrial Action topic card
items.title: Industrial action
items.bodyText: The latest National Rail strike updates and information

image.name: IA image
image.altText: A view of multiple parallel railway tracks seen from above.

content.value: Learn more about National Rail’s goals and services.

items.name: Sustainability topic card
items.title: Sustainability
items.bodyText: Discover what National Rail is doing to help make your journey as green as possible

image.name: Sustainability hero image
image.altText: A station platform with a large planter full of a variety of colourful flowers.

items.name: Morph Topic Card
items.title: Join Morph on an Epic Art Adventure!
items.bodyText: National Rail has sponsored 1 of over 50 colourful statues on a step-free art trail in London, hosted by young person’s mobility charity Whizz-Kidz

items.name: Advance Booking Dates topic card
items.title: Advance booking dates
items.bodyText: See how far in the future you can book your Advance tickets and seat reservations

image.name: Advance booking dates hero image
image.altText: A man and a woman dressed in coats and scarves are holding hands and laughing as they run down an enclosed railway bridge with windows either side.

items.name: Welcome to the new National Rail site highlight component (grey)
items.title: Welcome to the New National Rail Website!

items.name: Welcome to the New National Rail Site card

content.value: We’re in the process of building a brand new website that will make it easier and quicker to find whatever you’re looking for.
We remain your trusted source for train information, so you can still check
(including planned engineering works). But you can also find helpful advice, travel tips and inspiration for your journey.

items.ctaLabel: See what’s new on the site

image.name: Welcome to NR image
image.altText: A train crossing the Ribblehead viaduct in Yorkshire.

content.value: Find out about great ways to save on your rail journey.

items.name: Saving Money topic card
items.title: Money-saving tips
items.bodyText: Check out our top tips to find the right ticket, at the right price

image.name: Save Money on Your Train Ticket inline image
image.altText: A happy smiling family of 4 are walking down a woodland path. A young boy in a t-shirt, shorts and wellington boots runs ahead while his mother and father walk behind. The father is carrying the young daughter on his shoulders.

items.name: Flexi Season topic card
items.title: Commute your way with a Flexi Season ticket
items.bodyText: Get 8 days of travel in 28 days, at any time

image.name: Flexi Season Ticket hero image
image.altText: Three casually dressed men are laughing and smiling as they walk through a station, with a large departure board visible

items.name: Railcards Topic Card
items.title: Get 1/3 off with a Railcard
items.bodyText: From children to seniors, there’s a Railcard to suit everyone

image.name: Railcards homepage image card image
image.altText: 2 elderly white women with white hair are sitting next to each other at a train table, holding train tickets in their hands and laughing.

items.name: Days Out Guide image card
items.title: Great 2FOR1 offers when you go by train

image.name: Days out Guide image card
image.altText: A Black woman who is wearing a baby in a sling stands next to a Black man, they are both looking at a fold-out leaflet and smiling.

items.name: Group Save image card
items.title: Travel together and get group savings

image.name: Group Travel hero image
image.altText: A group of young people enjoying a day out together at a fun fair

items.name: Railway Children image card
items.title: Help support the Railway Children charity

image.name: Railway Children image wrapper
image.altText: A girl in a purple top and with a black and white hood stands on a railway platform, smiling at the camera.

microcopy.ticketRestrictionsMicrocopy__introductor: Some tickets may require you to travel at specific times of the day, days of the week or on a specific route. Our Journey Planner takes ticket restrictions into account with the selection that you have made and will only have shown tickets that are valid for the selected trains.
microcopy.liveTrainsResultsMicrocopy__zipaboutTitl: Sign up to Alert Me by Messenger, SMS or WhatsApp
microcopy.liveTrainsResultsMicrocopy__zipaboutBody: Try our 'Alert Me' service that lets you know in advance if your train or station might be busy, as well as any disruptions or changes to your route.
microcopy.liveTrainsFinderMicrocopy__noResultTitle: Sorry, there are no direct services between the stations you've selected within the next 2 hours.
microcopy.liveTrainsFinderMicrocopy__noResultBodyT: To find the next available journey (including any options that require changing to a connecting service) you can
microcopy.liveTrainsFinderMicrocopy__apiDownMessag: Connection error, please check your connection
microcopy.generalMicrocopy__invalidDateDefaultingM: The date entered was invalid and defaulted to:
microcopy.journeyPlannerSearchModalMicrocopy__extr: Allow extra time to change trains
microcopy.journeyPlannerSearchModalMicrocopy__chec: Allow less time to transfer through London
microcopy.journeyPlannerSearchModalMicrocopy__date: Please choose a valid date and time
microcopy.journeyPlannerSearchModalMicrocopy__rail: Number of Railcards must be less or equal to the number of total passengers.
There are more than one of the same Railcard, please update your selection.
microcopy.journeyPlannerSearchModalMicrocopy__date: Date must not be in the past.
microcopy.journeyPlannerSearchModalMicrocopy__nati: Sorry, it is not possible to plan a journey from an Underground/DLR-only station to another Underground/DLR-only station - please select at least one station which has National Rail services
microcopy.journeyPlannerSearchModalMicrocopy__rout: Please select a station that is not the same as the origin or destination station.
